original_text: And there remained among the children of Israel seven tribes, which had not yet received their inheritance.
korean_text: 그러나 이스라엘 자손 중에 그 기업의 분배를 받지 못한 자가 아직도 일곱 지파라

sentences.original_text: And there remained among the children of Israel
which had not yet received their inheritance
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아직 그들의 기업을 받지 못하였더라
